turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a a black coffee from Peet's cafe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I want it black. Never, I want it black.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so a large, black coffee, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your coffee will be ready for pickup at the peet's coffee at 4th st in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, well I appreciate that. Thank you very much. Have a great and wonderful day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, have a good day.
